website_summaries.verdict: A unique option that's several times the size of typical stress balls. However, keep in mind that it may spring a leak if you twist or squeeze it too vigorously.
pros: Large stress ball that is fun to manipulate and makes an interesting conversation piece
Changes color from pink to purple when squeezed
Fun to give as a gag gift
cons: Prone to tears and leaks if handled roughly, at which point it oozes a pink-colored gooey substance

customer_reviews.title: Feels great, but didn’t last.
customer_reviews.text: This broke after 6 days. There wasn’t any type of damage to the ball. My son was just squeezing it like normal and all of a sudden it just exploded on him. It’s a disappointment because I bought one for each of my kids and they all really liked it. I won’t be replacing it because I’m worried it might break again and get all over the carpet. It’s really a sad situation because it was a great tool for my autistic son to manage his stress with until it broke.
customer_reviews.author: Clumzyklutz

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing EVER! I am so in love with this! Very stress relieving!
customer_reviews.author: Jesi Erin

customer_reviews.title: Caused major stress in this house
customer_reviews.text: What a nightmare. Ball was great and a lot of fun stress relief for a few days. Then it got a hole in it one day. No known reason. No one misused it. The fluorescent blue liquid inside went EVERYWHERE on our beige damask couch. It was like blue ink from hell. No amount of sweat and tears and expletives could get that vile blue liquid completely out of the couch fabric. Now, the couch is ruined. I'd rate it -10 if I could. Just thinking about it stresses our family out, now - and probably will forever
customer_reviews.author: herbgal

customer_reviews.title: Worked for few days, but quality issues
customer_reviews.text: At first the product was working perfectly, but after a few days of squeezing it at the office, a small puncture appeared in the ball which leaked pink paint, rendering it unusable. It’s a shame because it’s a great stress reliever.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando

customer_reviews.title: Broke on day 2
customer_reviews.text: First off I love the feel of this ball! So fun to squeeze. We got it for Christmas and today is dec 27th and it already has a hole in the seam. I am totally disappointed because I love squeezing it. I paid $20 for this and it last less time then the small one I got for 1.50 at American eagle. I will be returning this unfortunately. After reading all the positive reviews I was very hopeful that this would be a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Zach Spafford

customer_reviews.title: A good feel focus tool
customer_reviews.text: I love it and so does everyone else I hand it to. It’s all squishy and a good focus tool and hand massage. I bought a second for a gift and others were interested in getting one. Fun novelty and I gave 4 stars for durability only because I haven’t had it that long but I feel like it will hold up. Delivery was prompt and it’s packaged well and perfect for gift giving.
customer_reviews.author: A REED

customer_reviews.title: Feel so good in hands
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift, I admit that I took it out to try it and now I have to buy one for myself as i think it would be great physical therapy on my injured hand. Very calming and stress relieving. Not really a slow rise squishy but something that squishes and comes right back. Feels so good in your hands.
customer_reviews.author: BBB Farm

customer_reviews.title: Fun Ball
customer_reviews.text: My younger kids keep fighting over this, that's how much they love this ball. When I bought it there was only a pink color available, so it would be nice to have a blue or green version as well that boys may like better. But my son doesn't care much since he's willing to grab it away from his sister to play.
customer_reviews.author: Rena

customer_reviews.title: Say no to the extra stess of cleaning up the mess
customer_reviews.text: It popped within a couple hours of opening it! Thanks for the stress ! Delivered as promised 😜
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun fun fun
customer_reviews.text: This is really fun to play with. My daughter loves it. It gives her the same satisfaction as slime, without the mess
customer_reviews.author: LittleBunnyFooFoo

customer_reviews.title: Kids and adults loved it!
customer_reviews.text: This was a hit for Christmas! Turns purple when you squeeze it and was super fun to play with. Both adults and kids had fun squeezing and stretchy the ball!
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: awsome
customer_reviews.text: A coworker brought this into our SPED Group and I played with it and saw how my boss loved it as well I bought 1 for my boss and 1 for me. my students liked it so much I wanted to buy more but only could purchase 1. I'm waiting for more to come available so I can get 4 more.
customer_reviews.author: Sara S. House

customer_reviews.title: Leaking after a few days...
customer_reviews.text: This was my 4 year old daughter’s favorite Christmas gift...until it started leaking within a few days. I kept finding blue “goo” on stuff around the house - couch, carpet, etc. I couldn’t figure out where it was coming from until I saw it on the ball. Has a few very tiny holes. For the price I paid, I am disappointed this broke so quickly. I didn’t read the reviews before purchasing so I was not anticipating it to break.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: fun while it lasted but seller corrected issue
customer_reviews.text: Great item... until it pops. My house had 2. Each one only lasted 1 month. Maybe we had over stressed the stress ball. Thankfully inside gel/slime filling is non toxic UPDATE--- this seller is awsome!! Original review was 3 stars.. now 5 cause the seller is awsome!! The saw the issues in my review and immediately contacted me to correct the issue. I now have replacements coming and I didnt even ask for them!! Looking forward to try the newer model!!
customer_reviews.author: A. Pham

customer_reviews.title: Cool squish ball.....only lasts a couple of weeks
customer_reviews.text: **EDIT** I thought this ball would hold up well, but 2 weeks was all it lasted in our house. I noticed after a week it looked like it was thinning around the “plug” area of the ball. After that we were a lot more gentle, but it burst anyhow. It is cool and has a great feel, but for nearly $20 it should definitely hold up longer. I almost didn’t purchase this because of the price. I got it because the other filled squishy balls burst so quickly. This one initially seems like it will hold up well, and is the best feeling, most satisfying squish ball out there.
customer_reviews.author: Heather L. Whitacre

customer_reviews.title: super squishy and durable
customer_reviews.text: I love this stress ball! It's pretty big and durable. It can hold up to a lot of mechanical stress without looking like it's going to pop. The color changes to purple once you squeeze it a lot, which is fun :)
customer_reviews.author: Linh

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY- NOT DURABLE AT ALL
customer_reviews.text: This thing busted within the first hour of opening it. Very disappointing. Wasn't even squished that much. Waste of money. Will never buy from this brand again. The stuff was EVERYWHERE. Stained our hardwood floor till we deep cleaned it. Do NOT buy this product. Update: I am very pleased with Amazon's customer service response. I may have just gotten a bad one, but buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Marla Rain

customer_reviews.title: Great sensory product.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for its sensory aspect and everyone in the house picks it up and messes with it. It’s that satisfaction feeling you get submerging in the zorbies things. It’s getting lots of use here!
customer_reviews.author: GSmith

customer_reviews.title: Not durable enough for our needs
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted this to work as a giant sensory stress ball for my 6 year old. But unfortunately, it was too delic for her. I will say that their customer service was excellent! After our first ball got some small holes after only 1 day they sent us a new one for free. The replacement ball lasted about a week before getting the same small holes. It is very possible that my daughter bit the ball. I think it would have held up ok to simply squeezing, but it was not tough enough for our needs.
customer_reviews.author: SlingsbeeMama

customer_reviews.title: Needs a thicker outer skin! I waisted $14!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our students to relieve stress. It didn't last 2 hours before it burst and all that beautiful purple life oozed everywhere!!! I am very disappointed because the skin isn't thick enough. I just took the others back home!!! Total bomb!! Update: The large orange stress ball lived! After the pink stress ball died a tragic death, I took the large orange, watermelon, and the 3 smaller stress balls back home safely!! The batch number is included via an additional picture.
customer_reviews.author: Trina Hill

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like these. I was super excited to get them for my 2 kids. They were great while they lasted, but both only lasted 2 days of regular use before they started leaking. I'm not going to bother with a replacement and will just return for a refund. For the cost, I expected better.
customer_reviews.author: ATau

customer_reviews.title: SO sad about this item!
customer_reviews.text: This stress ball is freaking amazing. The color change, the texture, I just love it. HOWEVER, it literally immediately started leaking from the seam. This orange goopy strange liquid pooling out everywhere. I couldn't seal it for the life of me. We just kind of would use it sparingly and carefully. Well, one day someone who didn't know about the leak grabbed it and squeezed and it literally exploded everywhere. For how much this freaking thing cost, it should last more than 24 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Nurse Boo

customer_reviews.title: Breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: On our second one. We haven’t had the arrgh ball for very long. This is actually our replacement. My kids played with it the same way it shows in the video and it still got a hole in it. It leaked some sort of fluid and then we ordered a replacement. It’s like a ball inside of a ball it’s very squishy my kids like that. The type of material it’s made out of everything sticks to it fuzz hair and animal hair it’s kind of gross. I don’t think I would buy it again. If you do decide to by it I’d say have the kids play gently or only use it for squishing in the hand.
customer_reviews.author: J.V.

customer_reviews.title: Broke in less than 6 months
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift from my mom to one of my kids. It is large and has great coloring. But we were disappointed that it sprung a leak so early. She has not been near as rough with it as it appears the person in the product photos is. She got it on Christmas Day, maybe touches it once every week or 2. Today the seal popped and got blue goo everywhere. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: NC State Karen

customer_reviews.title: Exploding ball
customer_reviews.text: I cannot return item for refund because it exploded after an hour of play and my daughter had to dispose of it and cleanup a huge mess! Please refund w/o return of item. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Deana Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: WHAT A FREAKING MESS BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: The ball exploded the first time it was squeezed. Now I'm not talking squeezed hard, I'm a petite old lady. Purchased it for my grand daughter. I just squeezed it and it exploded. that purple ooooey gooey gunk inside squirted and flew everywhere. Spent 3 hours cleaning that crap up off the carpet and furniture. OMG what a mess.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Pinklady

customer_reviews.title: You or your son will love it!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this stress ball. He used constantly and sometimes I even use it. It is very soft and you can feel relax after squish it a couple of times. I will definitely will Buy it again. Update: I bought two more for two sons. They love it. It is really good to release tension. I will highly recommended. Disclaimer: I have no relationship with the seller and I just like this product very much. Third update: the ball broke at the second day. Request replacement and came in less than a week.
customer_reviews.author: YasLu

customer_reviews.title: Lasted for 2 days :(
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old loves squishy balls but usually the quality is poor and they only last a day or so. I was hopeful based on the mostly good reviews and the high price that this ball would be the exception but unfortunately within 2 days of using it, a small pinhole size hole appeared and orange stuff started oozing out. She was just as disappointed as I was. For the two days we had it, it was awesome. But now it’s a $20 Christmas present in the trash. I wouldn’t recommend this ball.
customer_reviews.author: Amy B

customer_reviews.title: I might need to buy another, my kids now each want one
customer_reviews.text: My middle one bought one and we were all impressed. My other kids now want one of their own. The fact that it has lasted over a month is a big deal in my house. My boys end up destroying everything like this.
customer_reviews.author: Joe L

customer_reviews.title: Really great stress tool
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a Christmas gift for my boyfriend and he loves it. It’s a huge stress ball, and it’s satisfying because you can really squeeze and pull on it and it won’t break. The color change from the inside is cool as well. The only thing is you have to keep it cleaned because dust and any loose particles of anything stick to it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelcey Walker

customer_reviews.title: Easily burst
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and quishy. The inside cover tears very easily and this will leak a sandy filling. My first one burst on the first day of having it and the manufactuer sent a replacement with the code from the box. So do not throw away the box for a while.
customer_reviews.author: LisaH1326

customer_reviews.title: Broke an hour after playing with it
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift for my 7 year old son. He loved it, it was fun and squishy. His 13 and 12 year old brothers wanted one too. Then it broke an hour after opening his present. Gooey slimy stuff everywhere. Luckily it seemed to be water soluble, it washed off his hands, floor, and couch easily. Would not buy again. Now I have a sad birthday boy. And I’m not too happy either. It almost took me longer to clean up the mess than he actually played with it.
customer_reviews.author: Joey bats

customer_reviews.title: Very cool feeling product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. We got it for our grandson who is 10 months old and is always pinching our skin because this is what he does with mommy when he nurses. Because this ball feels "skin like", we were hoping it could sooth him when we are bottle feeding him. He really loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Tricia wilt

customer_reviews.title: Cool but Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my child who has a little bit harder if a time calming himself down. It was broken and leaking goo all over in about 3 minutes. It did come out of his clothes and with a carpet cleaner out of the carpet so that’s a plus. It was fun and stress relieving so that is good too. But maybe more for adults who have more control over how hard they squeeze it?
customer_reviews.author: J. Burgart

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for teens!
customer_reviews.text: It is difficult to get "toys" for teens these days because everything seems to be about screens... So every Christmas I make an effort to find something tactile I can give my teen to enjoy. Both teens (13yr F and 17yr M) loved this gift, they were drawn to squishing it and throwing it to one another. I must say, even the adults enjoyed playing with it as well. Also fun for stress relief or a fidget toy.
customer_reviews.author: BPW

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Update: seller reached out and sent me a new ball. Very polite and prompt. Not planning to bring it to class this time. I'll keep it for myself ;) will say that squishing it is very satisfying. :) Had in my elementary classroom for less than a week before it popped. I was limiting it's use so it was only smushed infrequently. Purple goo came out. Easy to wash off clothes and carpet. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: alesha bartlett

customer_reviews.title: Popped
customer_reviews.text: Popped. Pink goo everywhere.... It's in the trash... I want my money back... Not worth returning....Don't waste your time or money. Not even 2 day's of use..
customer_reviews.author: T.W.

customer_reviews.title: Fun and squishy
customer_reviews.text: So I got this for my autistic 5 yr old and he loved it right away.. very big colorful and super squishy. When you squeeze it really hard you can this cool marshmallow looking material inside which is fun to look at and squish as well. I personally find myself fidgeting with it while I watch tv or when Im in bed. Good gift, distracting, good quality material.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Lind

customer_reviews.title: Exploded all over my son’s bed AND video game console
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 10 year old son to help cope with the stress of being quarantined. After only 3 weeks, it exploded while he was using it on his bed and the orange foamy filling spilled all over his Nintendo Switch and his bed. His sheets are stained and it took over an hour to clean the video game console. We are hoping it continues to work. We scrambled to try and clean everything up (so I didn’t think of taking photos) and it caused a great deal of stress and lots of tears. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: MaryL

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately, added more stress then it took away
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 4 of these for my family. I liked mine a lot and would use while working from home. I was little concerned when my youngest got a hole in hers, but wrote it off as a 11 year old being too rough with stuff. Then this happened, while on an important conference call. I tried to play it off while making mini barriers to try and head off the slow flow towards my electronics.
customer_reviews.author: Midlo

customer_reviews.title: Fun and good stress relief, but broke within a few weeks
customer_reviews.text: My girls and I all use stress balls or putty every day to help with stress and anxiety. This product is super fun and everyone who has walked by my office wants to pick it up. I loved this ball myself for fun and stress, but after just two weeks I had it in my hand and it busted open. I was really disappointed and expected something that cost that much would be better made.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Daughter
customer_reviews.text: This was just what my daughter needed to help with the stress of online school. Since school went virtual, she has been stressing out and this was just what she needed to help with that. When things get tough, she grabs this and works out her stress. Super squishy and just what she needs to help relax. I will defiantly buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Staci Hunsinger

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a friend who leads a high stress life. Great gag gift and seemingly very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Cory A

customer_reviews.title: Very enjoyable but fragile.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product as I have rarely loved others. However, within a week it had two small holes in it. I would suggest that it might not be the fault of the product, except that it has a relatively thin outer layer. The thinness of that layer is needed to see the color of the substance inside, but it doesn't lend itself to endurance. I loved this ball immensely and am sad that it has broken so quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Big And Squishy
customer_reviews.text: I love these giant stress balls. They are quite sturdy as they have not be burst open, and I thought they might by now. They feel soft and squeezable like soft bread dough. Fun to hold onto and DOES make you smile. Great for anyone. I say "Yes. These are something I would recommend." Have fun!
customer_reviews.author: Picky Customer

customer_reviews.title: Popped like a balloon
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 10 y/o son, he wanted a stress ball for when he plays video games and gets frustrated. Saw this item and thought it was something he would enjoy more than a plain ole stress ball. Well it popped the very first day he squeezed it. Not sure if we received a defective one or if it is just cheap quality. For $14 and promoted as something you can squeeze it sure didn’t hold up to the test.
customer_reviews.author: SMIT77

customer_reviews.title: Good stress ball but I guess it pops easily...
customer_reviews.text: This ball is good, but popped on the second day (for no apparent reason) and I was just playing easily with it. and has some sort of air bubble in it. it had a good feeling to it, but was a little hard to squeeze... it would make a good stress ball, but don't put it through hell! does change colors.
customer_reviews.author: James J. W.

customer_reviews.title: Not sure If I wanted to laugh or cry
customer_reviews.text: My son loved this, just opened and played with for the first five minutes. He said “the coolest ball” and All in life was great, no worries, until it happened. The unthinkable! It doesn’t really within stand being squeezed. More like just hold and touch! Like a volcano, it went everywhere. Ceiling fan, clothes, floor, face, 😂 We laughed, I wanted to cry after it taking close to an hour to clean. I’m sending back as a return. In the big scheme of things, Parents, if you own carpet I would high recommend not purchasing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke within two hours
customer_reviews.text: This ball lasted less than two hours in the hands of my eight year old. It developed a crack and started leaking gel. Huge bummer because the ball is very cool. We liked the size, the texture, and the versatility. But we paid $15 for less than two hours of use. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: SGilbert

customer_reviews.title: Best stress ball out there
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite stress ball. I have tried so many different ones and this is by far my favorite. Just like any stress ball, yes it wears out, but you just have to expect that. Where you have these types of materials what do you expect? If you looking for a fun, squishy ball to play with while watching TV this is the one for you
customer_reviews.author: Duckie girl

customer_reviews.title: It's oh SO good to squeeze...but the smell OMG
customer_reviews.text: Argh! Mixed feelings about this ball I so badly want to love. It feels oh so good to squeeze. it helps relieve so much tension it leaves you calm in the end. But, I am sensitive to smells and the smell happens to be too pungent for my tolerance. I'm hoping the smell goes away with use otherwise I''d be forced to wear a mask!
customer_reviews.author: Hannibal

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy exterior leads to leaking
customer_reviews.text: Had great hopes until exactly one week after use my son noticed the insides weeping through the outer membrane. Well, now we can’t use it. Have initiated a return for a refund. Would love to replace it but don’t want to risk this all over again.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Sticky. Hair and lint trap. Impossible to clean
customer_reviews.text: Bummed it got so sticky. Super fun at first but the stickiness makes it extremely unpleasant to touch. Every little bit of lint and hair gets stuck to it. Wouldn’t purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: C.Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Mine popped
customer_reviews.text: This works great for mild stress relief, but I wouldn't recommend it in high stress situations. I didn't realize that I could send it back for a replacement, so when mine popped, I just threw it away. I barely had it for a week and was using it in therapy. I'm hoping to find something else that's better for high stress situations that won't pop.
customer_reviews.author: Erzsie DeRichmond

customer_reviews.title: Gifted to a Senior Citizen, perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was such a fun gift to give to a women for her 83rd birthday!!! With the COVID shutdown and elections coming up, the stress ball was just what she needed, she loved it! Just working your fingers and squeezing the ball is relaxing! No odor and the colors were vibrant. Going to order one for myself soon!
customer_reviews.author: N. Stone

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and the "squish-ability". I am using it as a physical therapy ball. The weight is perfect and the ability to hold on to it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: S. Cardell, retired RN

customer_reviews.title: Bought 2, they both popped within days
customer_reviews.text: Bought one (the yellow) for my son and he loved it through the first day. The second day it popped and the inner goo was coming out when it was squeezed, which is the main point of the ball. Bought another, this time the pink one, same thing. The inner part popped after two days and oozed again. I watched him very closely with it the second time and he was not overly aggressive with it or throwing it around at all. It's just not very strong and cannot withstand being squeezed.
customer_reviews.author: Fallon E. Laughlin

customer_reviews.title: LOAD OF CR***P
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my daughter who is autistic, to center her anger into one object, trying to tame down her aggressive behavior. I recieced this item at 4:56pm and she managed to pop it open at 6:15pm. Buster all over my living room carpet. The purpose of this ball is to squeeze it so why would my daughter squeeze the it bust? Horrible!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Popped within days... Disgusting mess...
customer_reviews.text: Gifted this to my 9 yr. old daughter, and it completely popped within a few days. Left a disastrous mess all over her body and bedding. Took hours to clean up. Don't buy this! There are other brands of this exact type of toy that are more durable and long-lasting.
customer_reviews.author: BellMom

customer_reviews.title: If you have a child who explores toys with their mouth and strength this isn’t for you!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the way it felt myself and thought it would be the perfect addition to my five year old daughters calming corner for when she feels upset. However, under an hour after opening it my three year old had bit through it and had the gel/goo all over him and the house. I wish it would have been more resilient!
customer_reviews.author: Hayley Cacioppo

customer_reviews.title: Lesson Learned: Age 8 and up means 8+
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a fidget toy for my K-aged child. Bad move. She popped it within an hour. The toy recommends age 8+. I would go by that recommendation. A preschool or Kindergarten age kid is going to destroy this thing and you will be out $14.
customer_reviews.author: WS

customer_reviews.title: Good quality squishy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this squishy ball. She actually keeps it right next to her while doing distance learning to relieve some stress. We've had the ball about 2 months, played with with it often and no leakage. It collects dust or whatever, but it's easy to rinse off.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Enos

customer_reviews.title: Beat stress balls ever
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old with Aspergers LOVES this!!!! I also got one for my 5 year old who has some mild sensory issues. They both love these....they are big, squishy, and they change color when you squish them. Best stress balls ever!!!
customer_reviews.author: JenniferO

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last long at all
customer_reviews.text: This giant stress ball is a lot of fun, but after a couple weeks it deflates and loses shape. Almost 2 months later now, it's ready for the trash. So $16 for something that doesn't even make it a month before deteriorating is probably not worth buying again.
customer_reviews.author: unkle_77

customer_reviews.title: Is Just as Described
customer_reviews.text: These type of toys often are easily destroyed and although great initially are in the garbage shortly after receiving and using. So far this has been durable and works just as described. It is a hit and although purchased for my son with Autism is being used by nearly everyone in the home.
customer_reviews.author: Speaker Keeper

customer_reviews.title: I like this buuuut
customer_reviews.text: I like this but it gets gross real easy and despite washing it several times with soap it still has this weird chemical smell that is left on my hands after using it. So it just sits on my dresser at the moment hoping that smell will eventually go away.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Great for Kids with Anxiety!
customer_reviews.text: My son is on the spectrum, and the whole home-schooling thing has run his anxiety through the roof! This has helped him focus when he was frustrated. It is obviously not a cure for anything, and I don't know if it will work long-term, but for now this is a great help!
customer_reviews.author: heathermcc

customer_reviews.title: Good customer service
customer_reviews.text: Love love the concept , made too thin - son used for a day and just using as stress ball and got holes in it and it started leaking - ugh that was $18 in the garbage - not durable - rather buy 4 small ones than this - added note - the seller replied back right away to send replacement hoping it was just a bad one !!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells HORRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved the other one so much that we bought a second one hoping it wouldn’t smell as horrible as the first one did. But we were WRONG. Seems like this one smells even worse. We washed them and nothing helped. It smells so bad we got headaches
customer_reviews.author: Nelsi

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice And Squishy
customer_reviews.text: Very squishy and fun. I bought these for my sons. They are 15 and 16 y/o. They loved them, but I loved them more. Not being a digital device they didn't play with these for long. I still like them and do consider them a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Picky Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 36 hours
customer_reviews.text: I loved this thing! It was great to squish and knead, but after less than 36 hours it exploded nasty blue goo everywhere! My daughter wasn’t even being particularly rough with it! If I thought another would last I’d buy it again, but it seems that 1 day is the lifespan. Too bad
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Arggh Pink to Purple Giant Stress Ball
customer_reviews.text: This is a great stress relieving, fidget relieving, and sensory ball. It has a really neat and unique squishy feeling that keeps you distracted. The color changing from pink to purple is also fun. The only thing I don't like is that dust and lint easily stick to the surface.
customer_reviews.author: Keke

customer_reviews.title: lasted 1 day then broke
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my 11 year old son, yesterday, for his birthday. Today,he was squishing it and it ripped open and the sticky orange stuff from the inside of it got all over his hands. So...it lasted a day,unfortunately
customer_reviews.author: Kim D.

customer_reviews.title: Addictive and Awesome
customer_reviews.text: The regular-sized stress ball on my desk popped a leak. It was not just used by me, but also by everyone that comes in my office. I replaced it with this stress ball and I'm SO GLAD I did. It's pretty, it's really squishy, it's colorful and very fun to play with and very hard to put down.
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: Busted on day 3
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this stress ball because it states its durable. We got it on Sunday and it was busted Wednesday. I would not consider this a toy for kids. My son loved it and used it throughout the day. It just couldn't keep up with him. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Dax Prati

customer_reviews.title: One is not enough
customer_reviews.text: Seriously the best stress ball . I purchased one for me and I get more stressed than ever before!!! Mostly because everyone in the family have taken it . Love it . No problems with it yet . I will be purchasing more
customer_reviews.author: Tanners

customer_reviews.title: Busted in 10min by a toddler 🙄do not recommend. 9/13/20 UPDATE GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I feel like it should’ve lasted longer then 10min. My toddler busted it and blue goo went alllllll over his face and all over the place. If it was cheaper, wouldn’t have surprised me. But that was a bit ridiculous. It’s meant to be a stress ball, pulled and smooshed etc Don’t waste your money UPDATE 9/13/20: the company reached out and is refunding my money AND sending another one on them. That’s amazing customer service right there!!! Worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Wilson

customer_reviews.title: SAD START WITH A HAPPY ENDING.
customer_reviews.text: Lasted less then 3 hours. My daughter that is so gentle with toys was just in the back of the car messaging this and out came the inside after just a few hours. I have always been skeptical of these balls, now I know why. Don’t waste your money. UPDATE: Company did reach out and offer to replace it for us. Thought that was very thoughtful of them. I really appreciated them going out of their way to make it better without any effort on my part. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Erin L. Eagon

customer_reviews.title: Awesome texture, but needs improved durability.
customer_reviews.text: The squish/squeeze texture of this ball is perfect, wish the exterior material were more durable. We’ve had to patch a couple of puncture holes with Gorilla glue. Other than that, the kids and even the adults love playing with this ball. It does pick up dirt, but can be rinsed off easily.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Great stress ball
customer_reviews.text: Squishy great to relieve stress. Keep away from anything even a little sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy R Hendrickson

customer_reviews.title: Ours exploded unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know how to review this, my 5 year old daughter LOVED it! But it only lasted a couple of days until it exploded all over her and she was devastated when it broke. She wasn’t doing anything other than squeezing it while she watched tv. I don’t know if ours was defective but I am afraid to buy a new one. But we loved it while we had it!
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Be careful it will pop
customer_reviews.text: This is my second ball The first ball popped after 3 days So I decided to give it another try But I love the feel of it
customer_reviews.author: rita

customer_reviews.title: TOXIC!!!!!!! It melts paint!
customer_reviews.text: I have a child with autism and toys like this were recommended to me. We got it in the mail and my kiddo was so excited and he loved it at first. When he left it on his dresser next to his bed the first night it ate through the paint!!!!! In 10 hours!!! I threw it away immediately. DO NOT BUY!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Burst Open After 7 days!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing burst open around the seal after only one week! Blue gunk EVERYWHERE. I now have to put it in a ziploc bag and mail it back to get my refund. Stress ball that actually CAUSES more stress!!
customer_reviews.author: Sly

customer_reviews.title: Fun but Not strong enough
customer_reviews.text: Great product, if only it didn’t pop or tear so easily. I’ve had 3 and they all tear. Pricy for a stress ball.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved It So Bought Another
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for a few weeks now, and I stretch and pull this thing numerous times a day. So far, it has held up to all the abuse me and my family have thrown at it. The only problem was my kids were constantly taking it and playing with it. My daughter's birthday was coming up, so I decided to get her the other color. We have got a lot of enjoyment out of it and so far so good (no holes).
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: My son received the delivery last night. By 10:00 last night (few hours later) it exploded gooo everywhere. He is 12 so not very young. Not durable if it broke within two hours.
customer_reviews.author: Michael taibl

customer_reviews.title: A lot a fun
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my office so people can play with it during meetings. The coloring changing is cool And it’sa decent size. I did have to get a replacement because seam busted spilling out the contents. The second one arrived today- we’ll see how it goes.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Schneckloth

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: The seller reached out immediately and sent another ball to me within days. Can't beat the customer service!! This was a really cool squeeze ball, until it burst all over my daughter 3 days after I gave it to her. So now I’ve wasted $14 and my rug has been stained blue from the insides and I have to replace that too.
customer_reviews.author: Joy R.

customer_reviews.title: I Will be giving these out as gifts come Christmas
customer_reviews.text: As a special education teacher and someone who experiences stress her self, I found this product to be amazing! The paraprofessionals and I ended up keeping it for ourselves and I bought something different for our students. 😂😂😂🤣🤣
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Sarmiento

customer_reviews.title: Soooo satisfying!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best stress relief ball that I've ever had. It's super squishy and everyone in my family loves it. I'll be getting more for the rest of them :) It's texture reminds me of kneading dough when I make bread. Very enjoyable and highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool concept, buyer beware. Leaked after 1st use
customer_reviews.text: This product was awesome at first!!! It was just what the doctor ordered. The issue was after playing the with it only once, it started to leak (there’s ink inside) Was going to return it for another one, but the second one arrived (both pink balls) and the same thing happened. It was too messy to return either. I missed the window to return the original, so now I’m stuck paying for two balls that leaked and I’m out $40.00. Buyer beware
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Had high hopes
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a stim toy for my daughter, who has autism. She immediately popped it and got purple goo everywhere. I would not recommend this toy for any kid who is hard on their toys like mine is.
customer_reviews.author: Clare Romund

customer_reviews.title: An incredible gift for a high-stress teacher
customer_reviews.text: My good friend and teacher loves stress balls, so I got her this for her birthday. She absolutely loves it. This is a stress ball on steroids, a real two-hander. Seeing how much she uses and enjoys it definitely assures me that it was well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: MooreOver

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service. Fun, but messy if your kid is rough with it.
customer_reviews.text: Update: STELLAR customer service. Not only did they refund my purchase, but are also sending me a new one, even though I think it was my child's roughness that broke the product. Awesome for kids with anxiety. It burst 2-3 weeks after purchase, throwing neon orange slime across my living room. My daughter was quite rough with it though. It did come out of my light colored rug with Dawn and a really good vacuum. I won't be buying it again. Not worth the risk to my livingroom fabrics. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Randergrew

customer_reviews.title: Run, jumbo squishy ball. Great to squeeze, pull, throw :)
customer_reviews.text: Fun to play with. The kids and adults are enjoying the new toy :) we've had fun playing catch with this one over the last few days - I find it fun how it plops into my hands when it lands. Also great for squeezing, sensory stimulation etc
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: BUSTED
customer_reviews.text: Popped within the first 2 hours. In the hands of a 9-year-old girl. Big waste -- 'nuf said.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Was super excited to finally find a squish ball for my picky SPD son. He LOVED it. We have had it maybe a week and it's already oozing and we are unsure of how this happened. We are purchasing a new one as he loved it so much and hoping that is was not a defect in the ball so much as maybe someones nails may have cut into it. Other than that, we are really satisfied, but a little disappointed in the toughness.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty Clementine

customer_reviews.title: Our burst quickly
customer_reviews.text: The feel of this was amazing. Our sensory seeker loved it, as did our whole family. Sadly, it burst quickly even with appropriate use. It made a huge mess, luckily it did clean up and didn't leave damage to our sofa.
customer_reviews.author: doggielover

customer_reviews.title: Soooo Satisfying
customer_reviews.text: I got this for one of my nephews and made the mistake of showing the other kids. Now they all want one (and my sisters too)! Too bad when I came back to buy more, the price jumped from $15 to $20. After Christmas gifts it is, then!
customer_reviews.author: Reading Bifrost

product_meta.title: Power Your Fun Arggh Giant Stress Ball for Adults and Kids - Jumbo Squishy Stress Ball Fidget Toy, Anti Stress Sensory Ball Squeeze Toy (Pink/Purple)
feature_bullets: JUMBO STRESS BALLS FOR KIDS AND ADULTS: For every time you need to yell “Arggh!”, this fun giant stress ball is perfect for physical and emotional stress relief therapy
COLOR-CHANGING SQUISHY BALL: Vent stress, anxiety, anger or use as a form of concentration while squeezing this stress relief fidget toy; squish, squash and stretch the ball to see it change colors
CALMING SENSORY TOYS FOR KIDS: This stress ball for kids can also be an effective ADHD ADD Autism toy to help kids relax and focus; these fun sensory balls are safe, nontoxic, tactile toys for kids
PRODUCT SPECS: This giant squishy ball can be used for wrist, hand, and finger exercises; ball is filled with nontoxic gel and measures 5 inches in diameter
FUN YOU CAN COUNT ON: Keep calm and get squeezin’ with our jumbo-sized fidget toy; We’ll provide a full refund if you’re not thrilled with our Arggh! stress ball for kids and adults

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars525 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
